price: A oni su lukavstvo smišljali, pa je i Allah njima lukavstvo priredio. A Allah najbolje lukavstvo priređuje.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
